description: It's the return of Wonder Man as the battle for the fate of reality comes down to one thing.......the Scarlet Witch vs Morgan Le Fay and the winner will either destroy time or repair it! Don't miss the shocking conclusion to "Once an Avenger"!!!
name: Fata Morgana

description: After the colossal fight against Morgan Le Fey, things are back to normal. The charter members of the Avengers goes in a meeting, deciding who should flesh out the roster of the current team. While they are busy debating who should be on the team with the new government liaison, Duane Freeman, Whirlwind commits robberies around New York City. Easily evading a giant cadre of Avengers, Whirlwind is finally stopped by Justice and Firestar, while being overlooked by Hawkeye. When the team roster is finally revealed, Justice and Firestar are placed on reserve for apprehending Whirlwind. The final roster is Captain America, Thor, Iron Man, Warbird, Hawkeye, Scarlet Witch and Vision.
name: Too Many Avengers

description: Because you demanded it, it's the clash of titans as the Squadron supreme vs the avengers; round 1!!
name: Accusation Most Foul

description: It's round two of The Avengers vs The Squadron Supreme with bragging rights to "the worlds mightiest" in the balance!
name: Earth's Mightiest Frauds?

description: Warbird has been taken captive by a renegade band of alien Kree. These alien outlaws plan to use the former Ms. Marvel's unique genetic makeup (she's part human and part Kree) to transform the Earth's population into a race of Neo-Kree. Now, the Avengers, with Quicksilver in tow, must rocket to the moon to try and stop this mad scheme before it comes to fruition.
name: The Court Martial of Carol Danvers

description: Its the debut of the all new 3 by 3 superhero Triathalon! With the Avengers along for the ride and what does this haveto do with the triune Understanding?
name: Turbulence

description: After an attack on American soil, Earth's Mightiest Heroes must face the earthshaking power and super technology of Moses Magnum. Plus, more secrets are revealed about the mysterious new hero Triathlon.
name: The Villain Who Fell from Grace With the Earth

description:
The earths Mightiest are on parade as new york plays tribute to their greatest heroes, but the grim reaper has returned and he's now more powerful than ever; trouble is he's brought some friends.......the dead avengers of yesteryear! Whats worst is he's joined by brother Simon williams known the world over as Wonderman!!

All this and Wanda the scarlet Witch pays a visit to Agatha Harkness...and this meeting may hold the key to it all!!!

This issue boasts an appearance by everyone who had ever been an Avenger at that point. While other issues have similarly featured a lot of Avengers (such as the opening issue of this volume), to date this remains the only issue to feature the most complete iteration of every member of the team. The only absent past members who don't make an appearance are Iron Boy and Moira Brandon.
name: Pomp & Pageantry

description: Captain Marvel, Doctor Druid, Hellcat, Mockingbird, Swordsman, Thunder-Strike, and Wonder Man all fell in the line of duty while serving in the ranks of the Avengers. So why would they come back from the dead just to destroy the team they once were apart of? Because they're all now slaves under the power of the deadly Grim Reaper, that's why!
name: Always an Avenger

description: It had to happen....It's the thunderbolts vs the avengers but what's this? Hawkeye is leading the Thunderbolts?? Has he returned to villany or is something far more sinister afoot?
name: Old Entanglements

description: Firestar and Justice visit their old teammates - the New Warriors! Scarlet Witch is elected leader in Captain America's absence. The New Warriors, Firestar and Justice encounter the Lords Templar, and call in the Avengers after their in trouble. He retreats and they get away.
name: Lords and Leaders

description: After hearing Wonder Man has returned once more, his old pal the Beast makes an appearance to visit him. Beast, Vision, Wonder Man, and Scarlet Witch go out to the bar and discuss Simon's situation. The Avengers confront Pagan, a warrior, and manages to lure him away from the city. Scarlet Witch confronts Captain America. Beast once again leaves. Through the issue, Busiek and Perez narrate in person.
name: Hi, Honey...I'm Hooooome!

description: Triathlon returns, performing at a Triune Understanding rally. The Avengers search for Lord Templar and Pagan, eventually finding the latter and engaging him in combat, with Triathlon aiding them. Templar appears in the midst of the battle and blasts Pagan, leaving with Pagan moments later. Lord Templar is revealed as Jonathon Tremont.
name: The Three-Fold Path

first_appearance_locations.name: Triune Understanding World Headquarters and Resource Center

location_credits.name: Triune Understanding World Headquarters and Resource Center

description: The robotic menace known as the Doomsday Man has recruited the always dangerous Wrecking Crew to apprehend Ms. Marvel. But the only Ms. Marvel the Crew is familiar with is Monica Rambeau, the energized heroine who served with the Avengers during the Masters of Evil assault on Avengers Mansion (see Avengers (1st Series) #273-277). Sit back and enjoy this tale of mistaken identity.
name: Mistaken Identity

description: The Wrecking Crew have escaped with Photon through a rift in time and space. The Avengers, thanks to Thor's mystic mallet, quickly follow and find themselves in the world ruled by the thunderbolt wielding warlord known as Arkon. Meanwhile, Warbird, Iron Man, Marvel Boy, Wasp, and Goliath (Hank Pym) face off against the mechanical menace of the Doomsday Man.
name: Cage of Freedom

description: It's the final showdown between the mighty Avengers, Arkon, Thundra, and the Wrecking Crew, and the life of Photon hangs in the balance.
name: Battle for Imperion City

description: A Wakandan facility is being attacked, as Black Panther attempts to defend it. Firestar and Justice are moving into the mansion, as Thor, Captain America, and Iron Man are having a press conference. Wasp crashes in the window talking about Giant-Man being kidnapped. Scarlet Witch and Wonder Man are at a club, where Wanda is dancing. They all gather together and head towards Wakanda, where Alkhema is attacking Black Panther. With the help of Scarlet Witch, the Avengers defeat her, only to see Ultron attacking Slorenia.
name: This Evil Renewed

description: The Avengers arrive at the Pentagon, where they to split into teams, one investigating Hank Pym's disappearance, the other going to Slorenia. At Hank's Lab, that team, consisting of Scarlet Witch, Wasp, Wonder Man, and the Vision is attacked by numerous Ultron robots. Wanda is taken out by the Encephalo-ray, followed by the Vision, then Wasp, and finally Wonder Man is overpowered. The other Avengers (Firestar, Black Panther, Thor, and Captain America), arrive in Slorenia as Justice (injured) goes back to Avengers mansion. Lastly, Ultron has gathered the Vision, Wonder Man, Scarlet Witch, Giant-Man, Wasp, and Eric Williams as his family, revealing to make them the 'seeds' of the next race.
name: This Evil Unfolding

description: The Slorenia strike force arrives at location, where they start their assault on the necro-cyborgs. Meanwhile, Ultron unveils his plan to his "family" of hostages. The Slorenia team assaults an Ultron robot as Justice, back at Avengers mansion shifts through Avengers history for clues about Ultron. They Slorenia team finally defeats the Ultron, only to be attacked by numerous other Ultrons.
name: This Evil Unveiled

description: The Slorenia strikeforce team of Avengers (Black Panther, Captain America, Thor, and Firestar) are being swarmed by hundreds of Ultron robots, and are close to being overwhelmed. Jarvis notices Justice is gone from Avengers Mansion. Ultron is nearly done making the brain imprints of his 'family', as the Vision gets free as well as Eric Williams. He frees the other captives as the strikeforce crashes through the door. They swarm Ultron as Justice arrives and gives them Vibranium, which can defeat Ultron. The team regroups as Alkhema is revealed to have all the imprinted brain patterns.
name: This Evil Triumphant

description: The Avengers are amidst a training session, where Justice is finally getting over his star-struck nature, and helps complete the training session. Outside the Avengers are facing race and anti-mutant protests, as they look out the window. Scarlet Witch is attempting to confront Vision, as is Wonder Man, about their pasts together. The two engaging in some physical combat, as they argue over their histories and reveal some jealousy. Vision departs to an unknown location after their confrontation. Lastly, Carnivore is gathered by Stonecutter, Decay, and Conquest for the Examplars.
name: Showdown

description:
An Unknow figure is running from something at the start of the book, attempting to reach the Avengers. The Avengers discuss the recent protests against mutants and african-americans. Justice gets his cast removed and then talks with Angelica, wanting to ask her something. Quicksilver arrives at the mansion, finding someone looking through Avengers trash, before confronting the Avengers about it. Justice unveils a new costume as they discuss the Triune understanding, which Duane Freeman is a member of, suprisingly. A rocky tower is floating above the city, and the Avengers respond.

It is revealed to be the Exemplars, looking for Juggernaut. They are not unified, and argue amongst each other. They finally find Juggernaut and attack him, taking him away in front of the Avengers.
name: Harsh Judgements

description:
The Exemplars are keeping Juggernaut prisoner, for crimes against the others in previous adventures. Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver confront each other about him joining their father in Genosha. The Avengers gather an all-star team to confront the Exemplars, consising of Avengers, Captain America, Wasp, Giant-Man, Scarlet Witch, Wonder Man, Hercules, Thor, Firestar, Justice, Quicksilver, Iron Man, and Spider-Man, along with the New Warrior Nova. They confront the Exemplars and are defeated, except Captain America. Captain America eventually nearly convinces them all to return to their former selves. In panic, Bedlam turns them all back to their more violent selves and they retreat.

In the end of the issue, Thor assaults a pushy cameraman with his hammer, and an angry Captain America leaves the team.
name: The Ninth Day

description: Silverclaw, Ant-Man, and Warbird get notes from someone claiming to be Captain America, asking them to meet him on the Brooklyn Bridge at midnight. There, he explains they are inflitrating the Triune Understanding and Captain Marvel joins their group, but feels something is wrong. When there, Cap reveals they have to destroy a machine, though he seems to adamant that they do it. After the group realizes something is wrong, Cap is revealed to be Taskmaster and he attacks them, using Lord Templar to knock them all out and frame them for the destruction of the facility.
name: Under Cover of Night

first_appearance_locations.name: Triune Understanding World Headquarters and Resource Center

location_credits.name: Triune Understanding World Headquarters and Resource Center

description:
The Avengers are meeting to gather a new line-up, in the recent events surrounding the protests. Justice and Firestar announce they ae leaving for personal reasons, as does Wonder Man. Thor refuses to apologize for attacking the press, and leaves because Duane confronts him about it.

Wasp and Goliath arrive, accepting the invitation to join the team, just as the group who were framed by Lord Templar arrives. After contacting all black and latino former Avengers and getting rejected, the Avengers are stuck in their place. Warbird is then accepted on the team. The Triune arrives on the scene and Triathlon stops a crime in progress against the Avengers, and is then accepted into the Avengers. She-Hulk is the last fit into the team and is holding the Vision's spot. They announce it to the press very undramatically, and walk off the stage somberly.

In the Epilouge, a man is attacked by a man riding a bird in South America.

Also features reprints of:

-Avengers #150 (which reprinted Avengers #16)

-Avengers #151

-Avengers Annual #19

-Avengers #101
name: New Order

description: The Avengers are perfoming a demonstration for the public by destroying a builiding to get back in good standards, as Silverclaw gets a message from her hometown that she must return, and the Avengers accompany her. Her history is revealed as is the fact that her town has been transformed into some sort of palace. They are assaulted by men riding giant hawks, and Warbird and Iron Man fight them off. Getting to safety, the land and attempt to get into the city, only to be transformed into warriors from the city. They gather water and Triathlon and Iron Man conflict over the fact Iron Man didn't want to let him on the team just because he was black. Silverclaw screams and reveals they are after her mother, the goddess Peliali.
name: Long Shadows of Forgotten Spires

description: The Avengers watch as Silverclaw's mother, the goddess Peliali is assaulted by bird-men, and are in turn assaulted. They cannot reach her in time, and the bird-men flee with her. The army arrives and the team splits up, with Wasp and Iron Man talking with the army as everyone else enters the city, with a myserious figure following them. They are attacked and defeated at a bar where their identities were revealed.
name: A Dream of Bitter Ash

description: Kulan Gath is holding a celebration with the Avengers prisoners, using Peliali in an attempt to achieve godhood as Wasp meets with the president of Costa Verde. Silverclaw recongizes an old friend and nearly convinces her that it's real, only to fail as a guard attacks her. The Avengers get free and attack, gaining support from the military and eventually the townspeople. In the end, the Avengers prevail, though Peliali died. In the end, Silverclaw is promoted as a reserve Avenger. It is revealed that what appears to be Yellowjacket is hiding on the ship with them, though Giant-Man is with them.
name: The Death-Song of Kulan Gath

description: The Vision returns as we kick off the storyline that leads to the AVENGERS/THUNDERBOLTS summer collision! How has the synthezoid's time away from the Earth's Mightiest Heroes changed him? And when the Grim Reaper declares war on Madame Masque, which side will the Avengers end up taking?
name: And So it Begins

description: The Black Widow guest-stars as the secret history of Madame Masque is revealed! Who is Masque? Who is Benedict? They're not who you think! Meanwhile, the Avengers discover who the Grim Reaper is working for, who turns out to be a much-requested foe! Plus: Wonder Man returns as the AVENGERS/THUNDERBOLTS crossover continues to build up steam!
name: Behind the Masque

description: After months of buildup, the annual AVENGERS/THUNDERBOLTS crossover explodes! Only a stroke of luck allowed the Avengers to defeat him in the past! Now, a fully-powered Count Nefaria has returned! The key to taking him down is locked in the mind of Madame Masque, but can Iron Man convince her to help the team against her own father? We'll all find out as the story barrels into next month's THUNDERBOLTS #44!
name: Tainted Love

description: Continued from the events of THUNDERBOLTS #44, as both teams, plus guest-stars Black Widow and Captain America, battle an all-powerful Count Nefaria for nothing less than the fate of the world! Plus all sorts of cool stuff that we could tell you, but we won't spoil all the fun!
name: Nefaria Protocols

description: The Avengers Infinity are on the Spaceport serving Selandiar, council planet of the intergalactic powers.
name: Interstellar Intrigues

first_appearance_locations.name: Triune Understanding World Headquarters and Resource Center

location_credits.name: Triune Understanding World Headquarters and Resource Center

description: The restless dead of Slorenia manifest a gigantic knight form which endangers innocent lives.
name: Scorched Earth

description: From the situation in Slorenia to Maximum Security, the trials and tribulations of the last few months have made the Avengers change the way they operate. Now, as their greatest enemy stands in the shadows, Earth's Mightiest Heroes go on the attack around the globe, and a new, yet familiar menace rises in the hills of Greece!
name: Above and Beyond

description: There's trouble in Greece, of the gamma-irradiated kind! And as the new Avengers jet off to save the day, reservist Silverclaw comes face to face with the instigator behind the avalanche of green rage!
name: Condition Green

description: Trouble times three! In Greece, the Hulk threat can only be stopped by the unexpected help of... Bruce Banner? Meanwhile, in New York, Silverclaw fights a desperate battle against the cause of this catastrophe! Finally, at an undisclosed location, two of the Avengers' greatest foes toast the opening salvo in their campaign against Earth's Mightiest Heroes!
name: Thoom

description: One of the Avengers' oldest and most powerful foes has descended to Earth with a dire message for all humanity! What is it? and more importantly, who sent him?
name: The High Ground

description: Meet the world's savior... Kang the Conqueror?! The time-traveling warlord has a message for humanity: he's seen the future, and humanity is destined to come to ruins, but he's ready to save us! The Avengers stand ready to take action, but their team is divided within!
name: No More Tomorrows

description: Â The pronouncements of Kang have heralded the end of human civilization â and the dark powers of the world move to make those prophesies a reality! Fighting a war on three fronts, Earth's Mightiest Heroes are stretched to their limits â while the real threat consolidates his power! But when in doubt, there's one time-tested stratagem: assemble more Avengers!
name: Global Presence

description: Thor goes berserk, and an Avenger falls! Earth's Mightiest Heroes strike back on three different fronts! Meanwhile, Kang the Conqueror maneuvers his pieces into position for a final attack!
name: Down Among The Dead Men

description: The second stage of Conqueror's invasion begins as the battle-weary Avengers jet off to Washington D.C., where the government unveils its ominous and unsettling solution to the Kang question! Plus: Thor and Firebird have a heart-to-heart talk, Triathlon and Jack of Hearts hit the town, and Hank Pym chooses a costumed identity!
name: Life During Wartime

description: Kang's invasion of Earth is in full swing, but suddenly the Master of the World rises to stop him! The former foe of Alpha Flight is back, and he's not about to let his planet become one of the Conqueror's serfdoms! Now, caught between these two warring villains, the squad sends a special Avengers Espionage Team to penetrate the heart of the Master's stronghold! Plus: the Triune Understanding situation rushes towards a climax!
name: Absoulte Mastery

description: "The Kang Dynasty" continues! In the midst of global war, at the heart of the siege on the Master of the World's stronghold, it's a romantic interlude between Warbird and the Scarlet Centurion -- possibly the one man she hates most!
name: In the Heart of Battle

description: Deadpool has stolen Killmonger's leopard, and has nabbed the Avenger named Triathlon as a bonus! Now the new Black Panther and Earth's Mightiest Heroes race to Wakanda for a showdown with the Merc With A Mouth! But with all this going on, where is T'Challa? Find out in the conclusion to the DEADPOOL/BLACK PANTHER crossover!
name: More of That Business With the Avengers

description: Once she was one of the Dora Milaje, a wife-in-waiting to the king of Wakanda! Now she is Malice! But is her aim to destroy T'Challa or Killmonger, who now bears the mantle of the Black Panther? Â
name: Beloved

description: A Maximum Security Tie-In! It's a MAXIMUM SECURITY tie-in, and the wrap-up to BLACK PANTHER's second year! Agent Ross heads to the Wakandan Resurrection Altar to revive the cast member who was struck down last month, but he's not the only one interested in its power! It seems some alien prisoners incarcerated on Earth see it as their way off this mudball! But is there even a Black Panther to stand against these otherworldly invaders?Â
name: Passage

description: Panther reunites with his childhood love - Storm of the X-Men! Will this super powered team-up reunite an alien child with their rightful guardian? Ororo and TâChalla bring the âStorm und Drangâ like never before!
name: A Story of Love & War, Book 1 - Echoes

description: Will there be war between Wakanda and Atlantis?! Tensions erupt as the Black Panther, the Sub-Mariner and Doctor Doom play a deadly game of chess! Guest-starring Storm and the Avengers! Â
name: A Story of Love & War, Book 2 - An Epidemic Insanity

description: The cold war goes hot as the Black Panther and Wakanda face a war with Namor and Atlantis, Magneto and Genosha, Lord Ghaur and the Deviants, and Doctor Doom and Latveria!Â
name: A Story of Love & War, Book 3 - The Trade of Kings

description: It's the catastrophic conclusion to "Sturm Und Drang: A Story Of Love And War!" With Wakanda on the brink of destruction, and the world on the edge of global conflict, the Black Panther battles to the death with his greatest enemy: Klaw, master of sound! Meanwhile, the fate of the world, and possibly the universe, rests on the narrow shoulders of... Everett K. Ross?! Â
name: A Story of Love & War, Book 4 - A Continuation of Politics By Other Means

description: Captain America guests-stars as the Black Panther is put on trial! It's the perfect time for new readers to jump onboard as T'Challa stands before the National Security Council! At stake: the citizenship of Everett K. Ross, and the Panther's right to walk on American soil!
name: The Story Thus Far

description: Anyone remember... Dakota North? Someone close to the Black Panther is targeted by Malice, but whom? Something's wrong with Everett K. Ross, but what? Super sleuth Dakota North is back, but why? Find out the answers to all of these questions in chapter one of "Seduction of the Innocent!"Â
name: Seduction of the Innocent, Book 1 - Disciple

description: People are dropping dead all over New York City, and Malice is to blame! And unless Black Panther gives himself fully to her she's going to kill everyone he's ever loved! All this, plus super sleuth Dakota North, in part two of "Seduction of the Innocent!" Â
name: Seduction of the Innocent, Book 2 - Innocent Blood

description: T'Challa is faced with an impossible choice: marry the killer known as Malice, or murder her to prevent a tribal war in Wakanda! And what about Malice's victims? Who lives? Find out in the third chapter of "Seduction of the Innocent!" Â
name: Seduction of the Innocent, Book 3 - War & Love

description: What is the Man-Ape's plan for T'Challa? And why is Everett K. Ross paid a pleasant visit by Henry Peter Gyrich?
name: Gorilla Warfare, Book 1 of 2 - Hell(o), I Must be Going

description: "Gorilla Warfare" continues with the battle of the century! In this corner we have M'Baku the Man-Ape, and in the other... Henry Peter Gyrich?! Meanwhile, the Defenders battle... a magically-modified Everett K. Ross?! Think you know the winners in these bouts? Think again!
name: Gorilla Warfare, Book 2 of 2 - Masks

description: It's T'Challa's 35th Anniversary, and The House is celebrating with a special edition 100-Page Monster! Part 1 of "The Once and Future King" takes us 25 years into the future, to a time when Wakanda has returned to an isolationist policy. And when Secretary of State Everett K. Ross is kidnapped by enemies of the African nation's king, T'Challa refuses to come out of seclusion, even to save his old friend! And so it will fall to the king's daughter, a child he has rejected all her life, to journey to America and take on a baker's dozen of T'Challa's deadliest foes, and to win her father's love! Â
name: The Once & Future King, Part 1 of 2

description: "The Once And Future King" concludes with great tragedy but even greater triumph! Forced out of his self-imposed isolation, T'Challa once again journeys to America and takes up the mantle of the Black Panther! But can the aging, grief-stricken king prevail against a collection of his deadliest villains, led by possibly the greatest threat he's ever faced? Â
name: The Once & Future King, Part 2 of 2

description: Black Panther heads back to New York City just in time to help Everrett K. Ross with his recent problems. But will T'Challa be able to return his friend to his true form... or will Ross be stuck as he is forever? And what does this have to do with the ancient and deadly menace of the Black Dragon? Guest-starring a plethora of heroes, including Colleen Wing, Misty Knight, and Iron Fist!
name: Return of the Dragon, Part 1 of 3

description: It's Black Panther vs. Iron Fist in 'Nuff Said combat! The karate king of K'un L'un is back, but he's not quite the Iron Fist you remember! Black Panther battles a murderously unhinged Danny Rand while time runs out for Everett K. Ross and, quite possibly, the world! It's super silent fisticuffs between two of the greatest fighters of the Marvel Universe!
name: Return of the Dragon, Part 2 of 3

description: Re-enter the world of SUPERMAN & BATMAN: GENERATIONS in this thrilling new miniseries! The lives of Superman and Batman are just part of the rich tapestry writer/artist John Byrne explores in this sequel to the first GENERATIONS epic, as landmark moments in the of Wonder Woman, Green Lantern and the entire Justice Society of America unfold.

The surprising miniseries continues! In the 1960s, the teen protegÃ©s of the JSA form a teen group of their own; sibling rivalry and other tensions mount within the Kent family; and an unexpected romance flowers in Gotham City's super-hero community. Then, in the 1970s, Deadman takes Batman on a harrowing trip into the shattered psyche of one of the Dark Knight Detective's greatest foes, and Hal Jordan embarks on a new career.

Elseworlds. The World's Greatest Super-Heroes are pushed to their limits as the Prestige miniseries nears its conclusion! In 1986, the Justice League of America must confront the truth that Batman has been driven over the edge. How can Green Lantern Alan Scott and a new Flash and Wonder Woman stop a Dark Knight who has gone completely out of control? Then, in 1997, a new hero stalks the streets of Gotham...but who is Knightwing? And how can Superman come to the new hero's aid while still exiled to the Phantom Zone?

The centuries-spanning sequel concludes! In 2008, an unexpected villain is reborn ? but can even Green Lantern, Knightwing, Cyborg, and a new Flash stop him without help from either of the World's Finest Heroes? Then, a leap to 2019 includes a look back at the year 1920, as Jonathan Kent and the young Superboy irrevocably change the destiny of the Wayne family, sowing the seeds for a truly timeless friendship.

Gaul was divided into three parts. No, four parts - for one small village of indomitable Gauls still held out against the Roman invaders.

When Getafix is kidnapped by the Romans, Asterix penetrates their camp to rescue him with hair-raising results.
name: Asterix och hans Tappra Galler

description: One little ancient British village still holds out against the Roman invaders. Asterix and Obelix are invited to help. They must face fog, rain, warm beer and boiled boar with mint sauce, but they soon have Governor Encyclopaedicus Britannicus's Romans declining and falling. Until a wild race for a barrel of magic potion lands them in the drink. It's not quite cricket - how about a nice cup of hot water, through ? Or even the first ever tea-party ?
name: Asterix och britterna
Asterix och skatten
Asterix i Spanien
Asterix i Alperna
Gudarnas hemvist
Caesars lagerkrans
Asterix och spåmannen
Caesars gÃ¥va
Obelix & Co
Asterix i Belgien
Asterix pÃ¥ irrvÃ¤gar

description: Gaul was divided into three parts. No, four parts - for one small village of indomitable Gauls still held out against the Roman invaders. But now they have an extra task or raising a baby.
name: Asterix & Son
Rosen och svÃ¤rdet

description: Â Reprints Tomb Of Dracula #1 andÂ  Tower of Shadows #1.
name: Vampyrens natt!
